name: Dropped (Game Head Studio)
description:
The aim is to drop from one floating platform to the next, while avoiding platforms with "Poison Plants" growing from them. Play through endless levels in three difficulty modes: Classic, Timed and Tricky.

Classic- Score as many points as possible while trying to stay alive, avoiding Poison Plant platforms.

Timed- You have two minutes to score as much points as you can, collecting "Time Power Ups" to extend time.

Tricky- Wrack up as much points as you can while trying to traverse tilting platforms which can trap you beneath
them if you don't watch your step.

Play again and again, improving your score as best as you can.
